segment.source: Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Deploy a GPO

segment.source: Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Deploy a GPO

segment.source: Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Deploy a GPO

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) enables an Approver to deploy a new or edited Group Policy object (GPO) to the production environment.
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) enables an Approver to deploy a new or edited Group Policy object (GPO) to the production environment.

segment.source: For information about redeploying a previous version of a GPO, see Roll Back to a Previous Version of a GPO.
segment.target: For information about redeploying a previous version of a GPO, see Roll Back to a Previous Version of a GPO.

segment.source: A user account with the Approver or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Approver or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To deploy a GPO to the production environment
segment.target: To deploy a GPO to the production environment

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO to be deployed and then click Deploy.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO to be deployed and then click Deploy.

segment.source: To review links to the GPO, click Advanced.
segment.target: To review links to the GPO, click Advanced.

segment.source: Pause the mouse pointer on a node in the tree to display details.
segment.target: Pause the mouse pointer on a node in the tree to display details.

segment.source: By default, all links to the GPO will be restored.
segment.target: By default, all links to the GPO will be restored.

segment.source: To prevent a link from being restored, clear the check box for that link.
segment.target: To prevent a link from being restored, clear the check box for that link.

segment.source: To prevent all links from being restored, clear the Restore Links check box in the Deploy GPO dialog box.
segment.target: To prevent all links from being restored, clear the Restore Links check box in the Deploy GPO dialog box.

segment.source: Click Yes.
segment.target: Click Yes.

segment.source: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.
segment.target: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To verify whether the most recent version of a GPO has been deployed, on the Controlled tab, double-click the GPO to display its History.
segment.target: To verify whether the most recent version of a GPO has been deployed, on the Controlled tab, double-click the GPO to display its History.

segment.source: In the History for the GPO, the State column indicates whether a GPO has been deployed.
segment.target: In the History for the GPO, the State column indicates whether a GPO has been deployed.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Deploy GPO permissions for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Deploy GPO permissions for the GPO.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Performing Approver Tasks
segment.target: Performing Approver Tasks
